Dr. Moklesur Rahman has been awarded with Fellowship in Hand & Upper Limb Surgery from prestigious PMK hospital & Lardsin hospital, Bangkok, Thailand. He obtained his hip & knee joint replacement surgery fellowship from India. As a recognition of his outstanding services he is awarded with prestigious FACS degree from American College of Surgeons. He has  vast experience of teaching in different army medical colleges as a professor of orthopedic surgery. He has numerous publications in several reputed journals. As a military surgeon he is passionate about trauma surgery. Now Dr. Moklesur Rahman is consulting patients as a full-time Senior Consultant of Orthopedics in Square Hospital.

name: Prof. Dr. Muhammad Ataul Haqq
description:
Prof. Dr. Muhammad Ataul Haqq is a well-known Pediatric Cardiologist & Pediatrician with an experience of more than 17 years as a specialist. He attained MD in Pediatrics & MD in Pediatric Cardiology from Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujib Medical University (BSMMU), Dhaka, Bangladesh. He is a fellow of NH Narayana Institute of Cardiac Sciences & Narayana  Superspeciality Hospital, West Bengal, India.

He joined Bangladesh Civil Service (Health) in 1997 & served in different positions of Govt service.

Prof. Dr. Muhammad Ataul Haqq joined the National Institute of Cardiovascular Diseases (NICVD) in 2021. His skills and experiences helped him obtain the position of Professor of Pediatrics. He is the senior most qualified  Pediatric Cardiologist & now serving as the Professor of Pediatric Cardiology, NICVD. 

Heart problems in children are different from those in adults. Hence, some specific expertises are required to look into cardiac problems in children. Prof. Dr. Muhammad  Ataul Haqq, Senior Consultant, Pediatrics  & Pediatric Cardiology is now available at Square Hospital for the diagnosis and treatment of cardiovascular disorders in children.

name: Prof. Dr. Muhammad Ataul Haqq
description:
Prof. Dr. Muhammad Ataul Haqq is a well-known Pediatric Cardiologist & Pediatrician with an experience of more than 17 years as a specialist. He attained MD in Pediatrics & MD in Pediatric Cardiology from Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujib Medical University (BSMMU), Dhaka, Bangladesh. He is a fellow of NH Narayana Institute of Cardiac Sciences & Narayana  Superspeciality Hospital, West Bengal, India.

He joined Bangladesh Civil Service (Health) in 1997 & served in different positions of Govt service.

Prof. Dr. Muhammad Ataul Haqq joined the National Institute of Cardiovascular Diseases (NICVD) in 2021. His skills and experiences helped him obtain the position of Professor of Pediatrics. Prof. Dr. Muhammad  Ataul Haqq, Senior Consultant, Pediatrics  & Pediatric Cardiology is now available at Square Hospital for the diagnosis and treatment of cardiovascular disorders in children.

name: Dr. Fatema Salam
description:
Dr. Fatema Salam graduated from Mymensingh Medical College in 1990.  After her internship, she was trained at Dhaka Shishu Hospital in Pediatrics. She obtained a Diploma in Child Health (DCH) degree from the Bangladesh Institute of Child Health (BICH) under Dhaka University in 1995. She achieved FCPS in Neonatology from the Bangladesh College of Physician Surgeons (BCPS) in 2012.

Dr. Fatema Salam has vast experience in both fields of pediatrics and Neonatology. She served under the Ministry of Health and Family Welfare, Bangladesh, and also gained experience working in Pediatrics under the Ministry of Health, KSA (Kingdom of Saudi Arabia). She served in the Institute of Child and Mother Health (ICMH) and in the Neonatal ICU of a private hospital. Currently, she is working as a Consultant (NICU) at Square Hospital.

name: Dr. Fatema Salam
description:
Dr. Fatema Salam graduated from Mymensingh Medical College in 1990.  After her internship, she was trained at Dhaka Shishu Hospital in Pediatrics. She obtained a Diploma in Child Health (DCH) degree from the Bangladesh Institute of Child Health (BICH) under Dhaka University in 1995. She achieved FCPS in Neonatology from the Bangladesh College of Physician Surgeons (BCPS) in 2012.

Dr. Fatema Salam has vast experience in both fields of pediatrics and Neonatology. She served under the Ministry of Health and Family Welfare, Bangladesh, and also gained experience working in Pediatrics under the Ministry of Health, KSA (Kingdom of Saudi Arabia). She served in the Institute of Child and Mother Health (ICMH) and in the Neonatal ICU of a private hospital. Currently, she is working as a Consultant (NICU) at Square Hospital.

name: Dr. Shukla Saha
educationalDegree: MBBS, FCPS (Pediatrics) Fellow, Pediatric Cardiology (Narayana Hospital, India)
description:
Dr. Shukla Saha completed her MBBS from Mymensingh Medical College and started her journey in Pediatrics at BSMMU. She worked at different hospitals in Bangladesh including ICDDR,B, and Sir Salimullah Medical College & Mitford Hospital.

After achieving her FCPS degree in Pediatrics from BCPS she joined as a Registrar of Neonatology at Apollo Hospital Dhaka. She obtained several hands-on training including a one-year fellowship in Neonatology.

Dr. Shukla joined as a Specialist, in Pediatrics at Square hospital in 2019. Thereafter she wanted to extend her career in Pediatric Cardiology to serve children with congenital heart diseases. As a part of that, she completed her training at the National Heart Foundation & Research Institute Dhaka.

She went to NH, Narayana Superspeciality Hospital in 2022 & did her training in Pediatric Cardiology. Dr. Shukla is also a Fellow of NH, Narayana Institute of Cardiac Sciences, and Narayana Superspeciality Hospital, West Bengal, India.

Dr Shukla participated in National and international workshops, seminars, and conferences on Pediatrics and pediatric Cardiology. She has more than 10 years of experience in the field of Pediatrics.

At present Dr. Shukla Saha is an Associate Consultant of Pediatric &Pediatric Cardiology at Square Hospital and treats children with congenital & acquired heart diseases in both OPD & IPD.

name: Dr. Shukla Saha
educationalDegree: MBBS, FCPS (Pediatrics) Fellow, Pediatric Cardiology (Narayana Hospital, India)
description:
Dr. Shukla Saha completed her MBBS from Mymensingh Medical College and started her journey in Pediatrics at BSMMU. She worked at different hospitals in Bangladesh including ICDDRB, and Sir Salimullah Medical College & Mitford Hospital.

After achieving her FCPS degree in Pediatrics from BCPS she joined as a Registrar of Neonatology at Apollo Hospital Dhaka. She obtained several hands-on training including a one-year fellowship in Neonatology.

Dr. Shukla joined as a Specialist, in Pediatrics at Square Hospital in 2019. Thereafter she wanted to extend her career in Pediatric Cardiology to serve children with congenital heart diseases. As a part of that, she completed her training at the National Heart Foundation & Research Institute Dhaka.

Dr. Shukla participated in National and international workshops, seminars, and conferences on Pediatrics and pediatric Cardiology. She has more than 10 years of experience in the field of Pediatrics.

At present Dr. Shukla Saha is an Associate Consultant of Pediatric  & Pediatric Cardiology at Square Hospital and treats children with congenital & acquired heart diseases in both OPD & IPD.

name: Dr. Saikat Das Gupta
educationalDegree: MBBS, MS ( Cardiothoracic Surgery), FACS (USA), FICS (USA)
description:
Dr. Saikat Das Gupta graduated (MBBS) from the University of Science and Technology, Chittagong, and completed his Master of Surgery (MS) in Cardiothoracic Surgery from the National Heart Foundation of Bangladesh. He received the prestigious fellowship from The American College of Surgeons (FACS) and The International College of Surgeons (FICS).

Dr. Saikat has 17 years of clinical experience in cardiac surgery. He served as Registrar in the Department of Cardiac Surgery at the National Heart Foundation of Bangladesh. He joined Square Hospital as Junior Consultant of Cardiac Surgery and later promoted as Associate Consultant. He has keen interest in developing Thoracoscopic and Robotic Cardiac Surgery in Bangladesh. 

He is capable of managing Beating Heart Coronary Artery Bypass Grafting (OP-CABG), Valve replacement or repair, Myxoma, Atrial Septal Defect repair, Septal Myectomy, Ventricular Septal Rupture, and Aortic Aneurysm/Dissections.

Dr. Saikat has published articles in different national and international journals. He is a member of Bangladesh Cardiac Society (BCS), European Association of Cardio-Thoracic Surgeons, The Indian Association of Cardiothoracic Surgeon (IACTS), and The American Heart Association (AHA).

name: Dr. N. I. Bhuiyan
educationalDegree: MBBS, MS (Urology), Advanced training on Urology (India, Thailand), Advanced Course on Laparoscopic Urology (Taiwan) Advanced Training on Use of Laser in Urology (Germany
description:
Dr. N I Bhuiyan graduated (MBBS) from Sir Salimullah Medical College and started his career as a Lecturer at Dinajpur Medical College. He worked in Dhaka Medical College Hospital in Surgery Department and later in Casualty Surgery Department. Subsequently, he enrolled as thesis student in the department of Urology in the same institute and obtained his MS (Urology).

Dr. N I Bhuiyan joined Bangladesh Medical College as Assistant Professor, Urology. He visited USA, Germany, Singapore, India and Thailand for extensive advanced training in Urology. He attained advanced course on Laparoscopic Urology from IRCARD, Taiwan and got advanced training on use of LASER in Urology from Germany. Dr. N I Bhuiyan was awarded Major Gen. K M Siraj Jinnat Memorial Gold Medal for innovative work on urology by Bangladesh Association of Urological Surgeons (BAUS).

He presented many scientific papers in different international conferences in home and abroad. He has publications in national and international level.

Dr. Bhuiyan is the author of one chapter of Urology book (Principal and Practice of Urology, Second Edition, Editor M A Salam) & involve in medical education. He is also Associate Prof & Head of the Department of Urology, Bangladesh Medical College, Dhanmondi, Dhaka.

name: Dr. Fazle Rabbi Mohammed
description:
Dr. Fazle Rabbi Mohammed obtained MBBS from Mymensingh Medical College. After accomplishment of tenure of comprehensive training in medicine at BSM Medical University & Dhaka Medical College Hospital, he obtained specialty training in Respiratory Medicine & completed his thesis in National Institute of Diseases of Chest & Hospital (NIDCH). He successfully completed MD on Respiratory Medicine from NIDCH under University of Dhaka. He completed postgraduation in Clinical Research in Oxford College, Toronto, Canada.

Dr. Rabbi developed mentionable expertise in Pulmonology especially in the field of Interstitial Lung Diseases. His clinical skills encompassed different fields of respiratory medicine including Bronchial Asthma, COPD, Lung Cancer, Tuberculosis, Pneumonia to name a few.   

He has been trained in Interventional Pulmonology, Sleep Medicine and advanced Pulmonary Function Tests in different medical institutions of Italy and India. He worked as a clinical researcher in Respiratory ICU, Sunnybrook Health Sciences Centre, Toronto, Canada. Interventional Pulmonology is a genre of special interest and efficiency for him. A good number of original articles have been published under his name in different international medical journals. He was awarded in different international seminars. 

Dr. Fazle Rabbi persuaded his research work on occupational lung diseases & explored Silicosis outbreak in Bangladesh. He is a Fellow of the American College of Chest Physician (FCCP) and member of  the Asian Pacific Society of Respirology (APSR).

name: Dr. Mohammed Wahidur Rahman
educationalDegree: MBBS, DA, MD (USA), DO (USA), Neurology Residency (USA), Fellow in Movement Disorder (USA), Fellow in Clinical Neurophysiology (USA)
description: Dr. Mohammed Wahidur Rahman wants to present his 16 years of USA-earned medical and neurological knowledge and skills for serving the people of Bangladesh. Although he is a New York State Board for Medicine licensed, Dr. Wahid has joined Square Hospital as a Consultant, Neurology.Dr. Wahid graduated from Rajshahi Medical College and completed DA from Dhaka Medical College. He secured his degree (MD) from Educational Commission for Foreign Medical Graduates (ECFMG), USA. He completed Doctor of Osteopathic Medicine (DO), USA from NYIT College of Osteopathic Medicine, Long Island, New York.Dr. Wahid underwent a neurology residency program at Desert Regional Medical Center, Palm Springs, California. He fulfilled his first Fellowship in Clinical Neurophysiology from the University of Kansas Medical Center, after which he carried out another Fellowship in Movement Disorder at Northwell Health University Medical Center, New York, USA. He worked at New York Medical and Diagnostic Center and Broadway Medical Center, in Queens, New York. He has extensive experience in DBS programming for Parkinson’s disease and essential tremors. He is skilled in EMG-guided BoNT Therapy, dystonia, EEG, EMG/NCS, and Botox for chronic migraine, etc. Dr. Wahid has extensive experience in managing a wide variety of acute and chronic neurological conditions. He aims to build Comprehensive  Care for Parkinson’s disease  Patients.

name: Dr. Sushama Roy
description:
Dr.  Sushama Roy graduated from Dhaka Medical College. After her Internship, she completed post-graduation training at Dhaka Shishu Hospital & Later BSMMU. She obtained FCPS in Paediatrics from Bangladesh College of Physicians & Surgeons (BCPS). She acquired clinical training in Paediatric Endocrinology from BIRDEM General Hospital.

Dr. Sushama Roy started her career at Square Hospital in 2009. At present, she is working as Associate Consultant in Paediatrics.

Dr. Sushama attended a number of workshops, seminars & Conferences. She has vast experience in the field of Paediatrics. She is a member of the Bangladesh Paediatric Association (BPA) & Paediatric Endocrine Society of Bangladesh (PESB).

name: Dr. Nizam Uddin Ahmed Chowdhury
description:
Dr. Nizam Uddin Ahmed is a nephrologist with expertise in the area of hypertension, kidney diseases, dialysis and critical care nephrology. He has clinical interests in volume regulation and cardiovascular function in CKD and hemodialysis with combined heart and renal failure (Cardio-renal Syndrome). 

He completed his MBBS from Cumilla Medical College followed by MD in Nephrology from Dhaka Medical College. He worked in several hospitals and gained skills and experience in providing his patients with the best level of care. He has experience of working in Dhaka Medical College, in Medicine & Nephrology Department for many years. 

He worked as an Assistant Professor in a private Medical College in Dhaka and worked as Consultant of Nephrology in Sheikh Fazilatunnessa Mujib Memorial KPJ Specialized Hospital for more than 3 years. 

Dr. Nizam Uddin is an active member of the Bangladesh Renal Association. He has many National & International  Publications to his credit. He joined  Square Hospital as an Associate Consultant, Nephrology.

name: Dr. Md.  Ashraful Islam
description:
Dr. Md. Ashraful Islam graduated (MBBS) from Mymensingh Medical College and completed his surgical training in BSMMU and Dhaka Medical College Hospital. He obtained his (MS) degree from National Institute of Cardiovascular Diseases (NICVD). For further development he achieved Membership (MRCS) of Royal College of Surgeons, Edinburgh and another from the Royal College of Physician and Surgeons of Glasgow. Afterward he was awarded his fellowship FRCS from the same college. He is a fellow of American College of Surgeons (FACS).

He has long experience and expertise in Cardiac Surgery, especially in the areas of both Beating Heart & Conventional Coronary Artery Bypass Grafting (CABG), Valve replacement, Valve repair surgery, different Congenital Cardiac Surgeries, Myxoma, Septal  Myectomy, VSR, Different Aortic Pathologies, Cardiac Trauma, Minimally Invasive Cardiac Surgery (MICS) and other Thoracic and Vascular  diseases as well. He did a special course of cardiac patients with diabetes mellitus. 

Dr. Ashraful Islam enriched his career through continuous participations in international seminars. He presented papers in conferences and has a number of both national and international publications to his credit.

He is a member of The Society of Thoracic Surgeons, The European Association of Cardio-Thoracic Surgeons and Bangladesh Medical Association (BMA).

name: Dr. Md. Mesbah Uddin
description:
Dr. Md. Mesbah Uddin joined Square Hospital in 2006 as a resident of Cardiac Surgery Department. After completing his postgraduate degree in cardiovascular surgery from NICVD, he was then promoted as a specialist. He has 16 years of experience and skills to assist and perform a wide array of cardiac surgeries like Bypass Surgeries (CABG), Minimally Invasive Cardiac Surgery (MICS), Redo or repeat cardiac surgery, Aortic surgery-specially Bentall, David procedure and Total Arch Replacement. 

He served government and private institutions before joining Square. He can manage various vascular conditions independently, for example Acute Vascular Disease, Deep Vein Thrombosis, Chronic peripheral vascular disease and Varicose veins. He can operate a variety of cardiac tumors, vascular tumors & chest wall tumor.

Dr. Mesbah is the organizing secretary of Cardiac Surgeon’s Society of Bangladesh (CSSB). He is also a member of Bangladesh Association of Cardio-thoracic & Vascular Surgeons (BACTVS) & Bangladesh Medical Association (BMA).

name: Dr. S. M. Sabbir Enayet
description:
Dr. S. M. Sabbir Enayet graduated from Dhaka Medical College and was a resident trainee in the Pediatric Surgery Department. He completed his MS degree in Pediatric Surgery from Dhaka Medical College.  He completed casualty surgery training in the same institute and then started working in Uttara Adhunik Medical Hospital. He also worked in Ibrahim Iqbal Memorial Hospital and BIRDEM General Hospital in the Pediatric Surgery Department.

Dr. Sabbir Enayet joined Evercare Hospital (former Apollo Hospital) and served as an Associate Consultant. In his extended working period, he gained skills and experience in various forms of pediatric surgical correction of congenital malformations, neonatal congenital anomalies, hernia, undescended testis, circumcision (Laser), appendectomy, and urinary tract disorders. He has special interests in pediatric urology and minimal invasive surgery.

Dr. Sabbir has many publications in national and international journals. At Square Hospital, he joined as an Associate Consultant, Pediatric Surgery.

name: Dr. Ayesha Siddiqua
description:
Dr. Ayesha Siddiqua is a women’s health care specialist specializing in Gyne and Gynecological Oncology. Her background and education demonstrates the expertise and commitment to high-quality women's healthcare. 

She  graduated from Dhaka Medical College and achieved her first FCPS in Obs & Gyne and second FCPS in Gynecological Oncology from BCPS. 

Dr. Ayesha has achieved  Clinical Fellowship (Hands on) in Gynecological Oncology from KK Women’s and Children’s Hospital, Singapore and also undertook advanced training in Cytoreductive Surgery and HIPEC(Hyperthermic Intraperitoneal Chemotherapy), PIPAC (Pressurized Aerosol Intraperitoneal Chemotherapy) from Aster International Institute of Oncology, Bangaluru, India. She  also has experience in Robotic Surgery. 

Dr. Ayesha worked in the Department of Gynecological Oncology at National Institute of Cancer Research & Hospital, Dhaka. She has expertise in the management of general gynecological conditions and gynecological cancers like; cervical cancer, ovarian and endometrial cancer, pelvic and cytoreductive surgeries, laparoscopic and hysteroscopic procedures.

She has  joined Square Hospital as an Associate Consultant, Gyne & Gynecological Oncology.

name: Dr. Foujia Sharmin
specialty: Associate Consultant, Gyne and Gynecological Oncology
description:
Dr. Foujia Sharmin graduated (MBBS) from Sir Salimullah Medical College and Mitford Hospital. She achieved her first FCPS in Obs & Gyne and then second FCPS in Gynecological Oncology from BCPS. She worked in National Institute of Cancer Research and Hospital (NICRH) from 2015 to 2022. Now she is with Shaheed Suhrawardy Medical College, Hospital. 

Dr. Foujia has advanced training in Cytoreductive Surgery and HIPEC (Hyperthermic Intraperitoneal Chemotherapy), PIPAC (Pressurized Aerosol Intraperitoneal Chemotherapy) from Aster International Institute of Oncology, Bangaluru, India.

She provides comprehensive care to patients with all gynecologic tumor and malignancies like ovarian, cervical, endometrial, gestational trophoblastic disease, vulvar and vaginal cancer, pelvic and cytoreductive surgeries, laparoscopic and hysteroscopic procedures as well as prevention of cancer. 

She has joined Square Hospital as an Associate Consultant, Gyne and Gynecological Oncology.

name: Dr. Silvia Hossain
educationalDegree: MBBS, DGO, FCPS (Obs & Gyne), FCPS (Gynecological Oncology)
description:
Dr. Silvia Hossain graduated from Sir Salimullah Medical College & Mitford Hospital. She achieved her first FCPS in Obs & Gyne and second FCPS in Gynecological Oncology from BCPS. She started her career in Obs & Gyne department of Dhaka Medical College. Later, she joined in Gynecological Oncology Department of National Institute of Cancer Research & Hospital (NICRH).

She provides comprehensive care to patients with all gynecologic tumor & malignancies (ovarian, cervical, endometrial, gestational trophoblastic disease, vulvar & vaginal cancers), as well as prevention of cancer. She has specialized training in Gynecological Oncology from Massachusetts General Hospital, Boston, USA and hands on training from Tata Medical Center, Kolkata, India. She also trained in CRS-HIPEC, Exenteration operation, Laparoscopic Surgery and has exposure to Robotic surgery. 

Dr. Silvia performs Radical Hysterectomy, IDS (Interval debulking surgery), PDS (Primary debulking surgery), Laparoscopic surgeries and different procedures like Colposcopy, Hysteroscopy. She joined Square Hospital as an Associate Consultant, Gyne & Gynecological Oncology.

name: Dr. Khondoker Asaduzzaman
educationalDegree: MBBS, DTCD (Chest), MD (Cardiology) Fellowship Training in Interventional Cardiology from Sri Lanka, Japan and Korea.
description:
Dr. Khondoker Asaduzzaman is a Cardiologist with over 16 years of experience as a former Assistant Professor of Cardiology at Sir Salimullah Medical College and Senior Consultant of Cardiology at Asgar Ali Hospital. He is now at Square Hospital and serving patients with his proficient style and approach.

After graduation from Rajshahi Medical College & Hospital he completed DTCD degree in Chest Medicine and then obtained MD degree in Cardiology to earn the necessary expertise.   He has several years postgraduate and post-doctorate training in Medicine and Cardiology from IPGM&R, Dhaka Medical College and Sir Salimullah Medical College Hospital.

In his professional carrier, he also included advanced clinical training in Interventional Cardiology from Durdans Heart Centre, Colombo, Srilanka. Dr. Asaduzzaman also received fellowship training in Interventional Cardiology from Shonan Kamakura General Hospital, Japan and then another fellowship from Asan Medical Centre, Seoul, Korea.

Dr. Asaduzzaman is one of the pioneers of Radial Intervention in Bangladesh. He is a pioneer of Bi-radial coronary CTO intervention and also a pioneer on Nano-crush in Bangladesh. He has vast experiences of diagnostic coronary angiogram (>25,000), coronary angioplasty (>8,000), pacemaker implantation, device closure for adult congenital heart disease (ASD/VSD and PDA) independently both in Govt. and private sectors.

He worked at Sir Salimullah Medical College and Mitford Hospital, Dhaka Medical College Hospital, ICDDRB and Asgar Ali Hospital. At Square, he joined as a Senior Consultant, Interventional Cardiology.

name: Brig Gen Prof. Dr. Md Abdul Bari Mollick
educationalDegree: BDS, FCPS (Orthodontics and Dentofacial Orthopedics) Fellow, All India Institute of Medical Science (AIIMS)
description:
Brig Gen Prof. Dr. Md Abdul Bari Mollick after graduating (BDS)  from Dhaka Dental College, has more than 33 years of experience in dentistry. He has been working as a Consultant  Dental Surgeon General, Directorate General of Medical Services (DGMS), Bangladesh Armed Forces, Ministry of Defence.

He completed comprehensive trainings on Oral and Maxillofacial Surgery from Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujib Medical University (BSMMU) and his grading course from Armed Forces Institute of Medical Sciences, Bangladesh. His dedication to dentistry secured him possessing the FCPS degree on Orthodontics and Dentofacial Orthopedics from Bangladesh College of Physician and Surgeon (BCPS).

He is a fellow of All India Institute of Medical Science (AIIMS) and obtained PGT in Laser Dentistry and Dental Implant from New Delhi India. He served in different Combined Military Hospitals (CMH) of Bangladesh Army. He also served in Kuwait Armed Forces Hospital and also in UN Hospital Liberia. 

Dr. Mollick has a long term hand in Orthodontics and Dentofacial Deformities. He is the founder life member of South Asian Association of Paediatric Dentistry (SAAPD) and also a member of BDS, BOS, IADT & IADR. He actively participated in various National & International Dental Seminars and   workshops both in home and abroad.

At Square Hospital, he joined as a Consultant, Dental Surgery and Orthodontics.

name: Dr. Raziuddin Ahmed
specialty: Associate Consultant, Internal Medicine & Critical care
description:
Dr. Raziuddin Ahmed graduated from Sir Salimullah Medical College (SSMC). After his internship in Mitford Hospital, he joined King Salman Hospital, one of the largest and advanced hospitals under MOH (Ministry Of Health) in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia. He achieved an opportunity to develop himself professionally by enrolling into Saudi Board of Residency in Internal Medicine. He completed his post-graduation in Internal Medicine MRCP from Royal College of Physicians, Uk. He also obtained  EDIC (European diploma in intensive care medicine) under European Society of Intensive Care Medicine (ESICM). He is also a member of Royal College of Physicians Edinburgh. 

Dr. Raziuddin served in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia for 12 years in Internal Medicine and Intensive Care Unit (ICU) where he gathered appreciable experiences in managing critically afflicted patients.

During his professional services, he attained advanced training in internal medicine &  critical care from UK and Belgium. In  his illustrated career, he attended many courses and trainings for example ECMO in Singapore, Critical Care Ultrasound and ECHO in India, advanced training on mechanical ventilator and hemodynamics.

Currently, he is the co-ordinator and one of the officially approved instructors by SCCM (Society of Critical Care Medicine, US) of FCCS (Fundamentals Criticar Care Support) in Bangladesh.

Dr. Raziuddin  is working in Square Hospital as an Associate Consultant in Internal & Critical Care Medicine.

name: Dr. Kamrunnaher Shultana
educationalDegree: MBBS, FCPS (Pediatrics) Fellow,  Pediatric Critical Care (CMC Vellore, India)
specialty: Associate Consultant, Pediatrics and Pediatric ICU
description:
Dr. Kamrunnaher Shultana, a medical graduate from Z. H. Sikder Medical College, embarked on a transformative journey in pediatric care. Following her MBBS, she dedicated four years to honing her expertise in child health across various academic hospitals. In 2015, she achieved the prestigious FCPS degree in Pediatrics from the Bangladesh College of Physicians & Surgeons (BCPS).

As a Pediatrician, Dr. Shultana garnered practical experience in pediatrics and its sub-specialties within distinguished tertiary and super-specialized hospitals in Bangladesh. Further enhancing her skills, she became a fellow in Pediatric Critical Care at CMC, Vellore, India, contributing not only as a clinical fellow but also actively engaging in impactful research focusing on the health of newborns, children, and adolescents.

Her dedication to advancing medical knowledge is evident through her authorship of numerous research articles published in renowned national and international journals. 

 Dr. Kamrunnaher is working as an Associate Consultant in Pediatrics and Pediatric ICU at Square Hospital.

name: Prof. Dr. Saban Horo
educationalDegree: MBBS, MS (Ophthalmology) Fellow in Cataract & Microsurgery Fellow in Medical Retina & Surgical Retina
description:
Prof. Dr. Saban Horo, a medical graduate of Patna Medical College, Bihar, India boarded on a progressive journey in Ophthalmology patient care. He achieved his Masters in Ophthalmology (MS) from the same institution.

He joined the Ophthalmology Department of Christian Medical College, Vellore, India in 2002 and managed various ophthalmic emergencies like corneo-scleral tear and lid tear repair. During this period he gained experience in Nd-Yag lasers and double-frequency Yag lasers. He was a full-time Fellow (Basic & Advanced) in Cataract Microsurgery in Sankara Nethralaya, Chennai and exposed to photodynamic therapy and thermotherapy in treatment of various retinal diseases.

As an Assistant Professor of Christian Medical College, Vellore, he conducted retina clinics wherein retinal referrals were seen, lasers were done and decisions were taken. He was involved in screening of premature babies in the Neonatal unit. His surgical work in anterior segment surgeries included cataract surgeries with and without IOL implant and complicated cataract surgeries. He became an Associate Professor in 2010 and  Professor in 2022. 

Prof. Dr. Saban Horo is competent in Cataract and Glaucoma diagnosis/work-up/surgery, ND-Yag Laser, Vitrectomy, Retinal Lasers Slit Lamp delivery, Corneo-scleral Tear repair and so others. He has many publications in national and international journals. 

He joined Square Hospital as a Senior Consultant, Ophthalmology.

name: Prof. Dr. Brig. Gen. (Retd.) Mozibul Haque
description:
Prof. (Brig. Gen.) Mozibul Haque (Retd) is a dedicated and accomplished Cardiac Anesthesiologist with extensive expertise in Anesthesiology and Critical Care Medicine, acquired both domestically and internationally. He graduated with an MBBS from Rajshahi Medical College in 1986 and subsequently joined the prestigious Army Medical Corps, where he completed specialized training in Emergency War Surgery (Biological & Nuclear Warfare) conducted by the U.S. Army Special Forces in Washington. Prof. Haque earned a Diploma in Anesthesiology (Graded Specialist) in 1993, followed by an FCPS in 1998. He obtained a fellowship in Cardiac Anesthesia at the Prince Sultan Cardiac Center (PSCC) in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia in 2001. To further his anesthesia expertise, he obtained a Diploma in Echocardiography in 2018 from the Medical University of Vienna, accredited by the European Society of Echocardiography.

Throughout his distinguished career, Brig. Gen. Haque has served as an Anesthesiologist and Intensivist at United Nations hospitals in the Democratic Republic of Congo and Ivory Coast. He has held prominent positions, including Head of the Department of Anesthesiology at the Armed Forces Medical College (AFMC) and Combined Military Hospital(CMH) in Dhaka. In addition to his remarkable professional accomplishment, he held the esteemed title of the President of the Technical Sub-Committee at the Sheikh Hasina National Institute of Burn and Plastic Surgery, Dhaka. Prof. Haque is a faculty member and examiner at several prestigious institutions, including the Bangladesh College of Physicians and Surgeons (BCPS), Bangladesh University of Professionals (BUP), and Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujib Medical University (BSMMU).

Prof. Haque has a particular interest in Transesophageal Echocardiography (TEE) and Point-of-Care Ultrasound (POCUS) in Anesthesia and Critical Care. His impressive breadth of expertise includes TEE, Regional Anesthesia, POCUS, and Cardiac Anesthesia. As an avid researcher, he has published more than 40 novel works, review articles, and case reports in various national and international medical journals.

name: Major Dr. Khandker Mahbub-Uz-Zaman
educationalDegree: MBBS, MD (Rheumatology), Clinical Fellowship in Rheumatology (Singapore)
description: Rheumatologist Maj. Dr. Khandker Mahbub-Uz-Zaman has the experience of treating rheumatic and musculoskeletal diseases. After completion of his MBBS from Chittagong Medical College, he went to Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujib Medical University (BSMMU) to earn MD in Rheumatology. Later, he proceeded to Tan Tock Seng Hospital (TTSH), Singapore for his Clinical Fellowship in Rheumatology. He also attended multiple musculoskeletal ultrasonography courses at home and abroad. He is also trained in doing nailfold capillaroscopy.   Maj. Dr. Khandker Mahbub-Uz-Zaman is employed in Combined Military Hospital (CMH), Dhaka, working as Assistant Professor of Rheumatology. He is expert in managing autoimmune rheumatic diseases (eg SLE, Systemic Sclerosis, and myositis), arthritis (Rheumatoid arthritis, Spondyloarthritis, Psoriatic arthritis, Gout, and Septic arthritis), metabolic bone diseases (Osteoporosis, Osteomalacia, etc) and auto-inflammatory diseases.Under his credit, he has several research and publications. He joined Square Hospital as Associate Consultant, Rheumatology.

name: Dr. Istaque Ahmed Milton
description:
Dr. Istaque Ahmed Milton graduated from CBMC,B in 2005. He obtained Diploma in Anesthesiology (DA) from Dhaka Medical College in 2009 and Fellowship in Anesthesiology (FCPS) from Bangladesh College of Physicians and Surgeons in 2012. He attended many training programs, workshops, seminars and conferences in home and abroad. He is a life member of BSA-CCPP and BCPS. He is also a member of BMA and BSSP.

Dr. Istaque Ahmed Milton completed his training from BSMMU and Dhaka Medical College Hospital in Anesthesia, critical care and pain medicine. He started his professional career as a cardiac anesthesiologist in Ibrahim Cardiac Hospital and Research Institute. Then he served in Uttara Women’s Medical College and eventually joined at Square Hospital in 2010. Since then, he has been serving in different level of responsibilities in the department of anesthesia. He is consulting patients as a Consultant of Pain Medicine at Square Hospital.

name: Dr. Nazia Farid
description: Dr. Nazia Farid graduated from Dhaka Medical College and later completed postgraduate training in Dhaka Medical College Hospital. She obtained FCPS in surgery from Bangladesh College of Physician and Surgeons (BCPS). She worked as registrar and specialist at reputed private hospitals and gained experience of performing elective and emergency surgery, pre and post operative patient care. Dr. Nazia Farid has also brief experience in working in plastic and pediatric surgery and is a life member of Society of Surgeons of Bangladesh.

name: Dr. Sarabon Tahura
educationalDegree: MBBS, FCPS (Pediatrics), FCCP (USA), Fellowship in Pediatric Bronchoscopy
description: Dr. Sarabon Tahura is a medical graduate (MBBS) from Mymensingh Medical College and obtained her FCPS (Pediatrics) from Bangladesh College of Physicians and Surgeon (BCPS). Afterwards, she completed fellowship in Pediatric Bronchoscopy from Qilu Children Hospital under Shangdong University, China. She achieved fellowship ‘FCCP’ by American College of Chest Physicians, USA. She started her career in Dhaka Shishu Hospital (present name Bangladesh Shishu Hospital and Institute) in 2006. At present she is working as an Associate Professor of Pediatric Respiratory Medicine at the same institute. She has attained advanced training and hands on workshops and acquired significant experience in Pediatrics, Pediatric Respiratory Medicine and Pediatric Interventional Pulmonology. She is highly competent in managing different respiratory diseases in children including chronic cough, pneumonia, recurrent respiratory tract infections, bronchiolitis, bronchitis, broncheal asthma, allergy, tuberculosis, cystic fibrosis, bronchiectasis, immunodeficiency, ILD etc with updated knowledge and advanced latest technology. Dr. Sarabon Tahura is the 1st Pediatric Interventional Pulmonologist in Bangladesh, performing all basic & advanced bronchoscopic procedures in children and neonate. She has earned significant experience and expertise in pediatric bronchoscopy for foreign body removal from airway and other advanced interventions. In Bangladesh, she has pioneered several procedures in children including flexible bronchoscopy guided endobronchial tumor debulking, balloon bronchoplasty, endobronchial electro surgery, cryotherapy, APC. She is frequently invited as international faculty at conferences, meeting and bronchoscopy workshops in different countries across the world. She authored the book ‘Paediatric Bronchoscopy- learn the basic’ and several book chapters on pediatric bronchoscopy. A good number of articles have been published under her name in different national and international medical journals. She has been awarded in different international seminars.
